程序包 com.pi.pano.ext

接口 IAudioRecordExt

  • public interface IAudioRecordExt
    recording interface,provide audio data collection.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void configure​(int audioSource, int sampleRateInHz, int channelConfig, int audioFormat, int bufferSizeInBytes)
      configure
      int read​(byte[] pcmData, int offsetInBytes, int sizeInBytes)
      Synchronous reading of recorded data.
      int read​(float[] pcmData, int offsetInBytes, int sizeInBytes)
      Synchronous reading of recorded data.
      void release()
      release resources.

      start record.
      void stop()

    • 方法详细资料

      • configure

        void configure​(int audioSource,
               int sampleRateInHz,
               int channelConfig,
               int audioFormat,
               int bufferSizeInBytes)
        configure
        参数:
        audioSource - audio source, MediaRecorder.AudioSource
        sampleRateInHz - sample rate
        channelConfig - channel config, AudioFormat.CHANNEL_IN_MONO,AudioFormat.CHANNEL_IN_STEREO, AudioFormat.CHANNEL_IN_STEREO|AudioFormat.CHANNEL_IN_FRONT|{AudioFormat.CHANNEL_IN_BACK}
        audioFormat - audio format AudioFormat.ENCODING_PCM_16BIT, AudioFormat.ENCODING_PCM_FLOAT.
        bufferSizeInBytes - buffer size

      • startRecording

        void startRecording()
        start record.

      • stop

        void stop()
        stop record.

      • release

        void release()
        release resources.

      • read

        int read​(byte[] pcmData,
         int offsetInBytes,
         int sizeInBytes)
        Synchronous reading of recorded data.
        参数:
        pcmData - output pcm data.
        offsetInBytes - offset
        sizeInBytes - size
        返回:
        read size,less than zero is fail.

      • read

        int read​(float[] pcmData,
         int offsetInBytes,
         int sizeInBytes)
        Synchronous reading of recorded data.
        参数:
        pcmData - output pcm data.
        offsetInBytes - offset
        sizeInBytes - size
        返回:
        read size,less than zero is fail.
